where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF( QUERY( i <* SELF.items | NOT('DEFAULT_TOLERANCE_MIM.DEFAULT_TOLERANCE_TABLE_CELL' IN TYPEOF(i)) )) = 0

where.label: WR2
where.expression: (SIZEOF( QUERY( rr <* USEDIN(SELF,'DEFAULT_TOLERANCE_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_1') | rr.name < 'general tolerance definition' )) = 0) AND (SIZEOF( QUERY( rr <* USEDIN(SELF,'DEFAULT_TOLERANCE_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_1') | (rr.name = 'general tolerance definition') AND (rr.rep2.name < 'default tolerance') )) = 0) AND (SIZEOF( USEDIN(SELF,'DEFAULT_TOLERANCE_MIM.' + 'REPRESENTATION_RELATIONSHIP.REP_2') ) = 0)

function.name: default_tolerance_table_cell_wr2
default_tolerance_table_cell_wr3
default_tolerance_table_cell_wr4
default_tolerance_table_cell_wr5
